summary: This is a search and seizure warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York, authorizing the forensic search of 27 electronic devices seized from Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little Saint James, on August 12, 2019. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the central figure whose co-conspirators and activities are the target of the investigation. The devices seized are from his private island.

persons.name: L. Cott
persons.context: Signed and issued the search and seizure warrant for the electronic devices from Little Saint James.

events.title: Search of Little Saint James
events.description: Law enforcement executed a search of Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little Saint James in the U.S. Virgin Islands, seizing 27 electronic devices from various structures on the island.

events.title: Warrant Authorization Date
events.description: The date appearing on the warrant's confidential footer, likely indicating the date of a related affidavit or the warrant's internal versioning.

locations: Little Saint James, U.S. Virgin Islands
St. Thomas Island, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: A federal magistrate judge authorized the forensic search of 27 electronic devices seized from Epstein's private island, Little Saint James, on August 12, 2019.
The search is for evidence of violations of 18 U.S.C. ยง 1591 (Sex Trafficking of Minors) and ยง 371 (Sex Trafficking Conspiracy).
The devices were seized from multiple structures on the island including the main residence, pool house, beach house, sheds, cabanas, and a maintenance office.
The warrant authorizes a search for evidence including communications with co-conspirators, records of payments to victims, and photographs of victims or potential victims.
The document explicitly authorizes the search for 'child erotica,' defined as suggestive visual depictions of nude minors that do not meet the legal definition of child pornography.
